stories.text:
I’ve noticed PCB Way used to sponsor the various electronics makers on YouTube.

But lately I’ve noticed PCB Way now just places YouTube advertisements over the makers videos and they’re not directly sponsoring the creators.

So really why would anyone sponsor a YouTube creator directly when the sponsor can instead just place a google/YouTube ad directly over the video?
stories.title: Ask HN: Why bother sponsoring YouTube creators? Why not just pay YouTube?

stories.text:
I worked out our GCP costs and then CUDs and emailed GCP Support for confirmation. They got back to me and confirmed that the calculations were correct.

With Resource based CUD's the resources that have the discount applied are fixed - ie if you use more resources any overage is at On Demand prices.

So I looked into Spending Based CUDs which is limited to a certain number of resources.

Has anyone used Spending based CUDs and are the discounts less than if you used Resource based CUDs?

What I would like is to get the maximum discount and the maximum flexibility in resource allocation.
stories.title: What GCP Pricing Strategies do you use?
